info.title: NaplanBridge API
info.description: Educational platform API with subscription management, exams, certificates, private sessions, and advanced analytics

get.summary: Get student's recent learning activities for dashboard

post.summary: POST /api/StudentQuestions - Student submits a question about a lesson

get.summary: GET /api/StudentQuestions/{id} - Get a specific question by ID

put.summary: PUT /api/StudentQuestions/{id} - Student can edit their question (only if not answered yet)

delete.summary: DELETE /api/StudentQuestions/{id} - Student can delete their question (only if not answered), or Admin can delete any

get.summary: GET /api/StudentQuestions/lesson/{lessonId} - Get all questions for a specific lesson
GET /api/StudentQuestions/my-questions - Get all questions submitted by the current student
GET /api/StudentQuestions/teacher/pending - Get all unanswered questions for teacher's lessons
GET /api/StudentQuestions/teacher/all - Get all questions (answered and unanswered) for teacher's lessons

post.summary: POST /api/StudentQuestions/{id}/answer - Teacher provides an answer to a student's question

Returns which terms the student has access to for proper UI filtering

Used for authorization validation

parameters.name: searchTerm

Subscription type that grants access (if any)
null if no access

weekCount.description: Number of weeks in this term

currentTermNumber.description: Current term number based on global academic calendar (1-4)

provider.description: Provider to switch to (Cloudinary, BunnyNet, Mux)

startDate.description: Global start date for this term (applies to all subjects)

endDate.description: Global end date for this term (applies to all subjects)

isActive.description: Whether this term is currently active and visible to users

description.description: Optional description for the term (e.g., "Summer Term", "Fall Term")

subjectTerms.description: Subject-specific term configurations that use this global academic term

API.Entities.AcademicTerm.description:
Global academic term that applies to all subjects in the platform
Provides consistency in term dates across all subjects

bunnyVideoId.description: Bunny.net video ID (GUID) if using Bunny Stream

bunnyStoragePath.description: Storage path in Bunny.net if using simple storage

muxAssetId.description: Mux Asset ID if using Mux

muxPlaybackId.description: Mux Playback ID if using Mux

createdBy.description: User who created this lesson (null for system/admin created)

rejectionReason.description: Reason for rejection (if status is Rejected)

updatedAt.description: When this lesson was last updated

createdBy.description: User who created this resource (null for system/admin created)

rejectionReason.description: Reason for rejection (if status is Rejected)

updatedAt.description: When this resource was last updated

studentCount.description: Cached count of active students enrolled in this subject (computed by database trigger)

subjectId.description: Subject the teacher has permission for

canCreate.description: Can create new content (lessons, weeks, terms, resources)

canDelete.description: Can delete content (usually false, only admins can delete)

API.Entities.TeacherSubjectPermission.description: Represents a teacher's permission to manage content for a specific subject

termNumber.description:
DEPRECATED: Use AcademicTerm.TermNumber instead
Kept for backward compatibility during migration

startDate.description:
DEPRECATED: Use AcademicTerm.StartDate instead
Kept for backward compatibility during migration

academicTermId.description:
NEW: Link to global academic term
This ensures all subjects follow the same term schedule

price.description: Subject-specific pricing for this term (optional - may use subscription plan pricing)

posterUrl.description: Subject-specific poster image URL for this term (optional)

posterPublicId.description: Cloudinary public ID for the poster (optional)

durationHours.description: Expected duration in hours for this term (optional)

termInstructors.description: Instructors assigned to teach this term

createdBy.description: User who created this term (null for system/admin created)

rejectionReason.description: Reason for rejection (if status is Rejected)

updatedAt.description: When this term was last updated

API.Entities.Term.description:
Subject-specific term configuration (pricing, content, media)
Now links to global AcademicTerm for consistent scheduling

avatarUrl.description:
NEW: User's profile picture URL (from Bunny CDN)
   (  Bunny.net CDN)
Example: https://naplan.b-cdn.net/avatars/user-123-abc456.jpg

teacherPermissions.description: Permissions granted to this teacher for managing subjects

grantedPermissions.description: Permissions this admin has granted to teachers

createdBy.description: User who created this week (null for system/admin created)

rejectionReason.description: Reason for rejection (if status is Rejected)

updatedAt.description: When this week was last updated

Bearer.description: Enter your JWT token like: Bearer {your token}
